title: S3 Ep6: Education creates peace
itunes:title: Education creates peace
description: New research shows how a school-building programme in Indonesia successfully reduced conflict. Dominic Rohner tells Tim Phillips about this unanticipated peace dividend, and how the CEPR's research and policy network on conflict reduction will help policymakers.
itunes:author: VoxTalks
dc:creator: VoxTalks
